data.description: This covers information about yoga and the advantages of this fitness program, and we hope that this information will help you to better understand this sport.

introduction.dec: Yoga is a group of practices and disciplines incorporating the physical, mental, and spiritual parts of the body. In the western world it commonly denotes the practice of posture based physical fitness, stress relief, and relaxation. Yoga has a long history dating back to 1000 bce. The most common yoga traditions(practices) are Jain, Buddhist, Classical, In Advaita Vedanta, Tantric, Hatha, Laya, and kundalini yoga. Yoga is a versatile fitness which lends itself to being able to be practiced as a stand alone fitness regime, or incorporated into other forms of fitness.

Yoga is an ancient and complex practice, rooted in Indian philosophy. It began as a spiritual practice but has become popular as a way of promoting physical and mental well-being. Although classical yoga also includes other elements, yoga as practiced in the United States typically emphasizes physical postures (asanas), breathing techniques (pranayama), and meditation (dyana).

Yoga can increasing the body’s energy, freeing it from toxins, reinforcing the natural defenses, thus optimizing the functioning of the body. It is considered by many as a holistic medicine that prevents and heals ailments and diseases (asthma, fatigue, arthritis, arthrosis, lumbago…).
